title: Vegetation Management Alert near Transmission Line
description: An agent analyzes satellite imagery and identifies fast-growing vegetation that could endanger a key transmission line corridor owned by the energy company.

tasks.description: Analyze the latest satellite imagery of the transmission corridor for vegetation encroachment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies several points where vegetation is within the minimum clearance distance.

tasks.description: Cross-reference the locations with the maintenance schedule to see when the area was last cleared.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the area is overdue for its biannual clearing.

tasks.description: Create a high-priority work order for a vegetation management crew, including GPS coordinates and images of the encroachment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent dispatches a work order with all necessary details.
